name: terminal-timer
description: A simple terminal timer that incorporates some of the ideas that Dr. Andrew Huberman was sharing in his podcasts: 1. The optimal single working session time is ~1.5 hours: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5HINgMMTzPE. 2. You will be more productive within the session if you make three short stops (~10 seconds attention switches/rests) at random times during the working session: https://www.youtube.com/shorts/akYXRHysdNc.
